descripcion: Vulnerability in the Oracle Configurator product of Oracle E-Business Suite (component: Runtime UI). Supported versions that are affected are 12.2.3-12.2.14. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Configurator. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Oracle Configurator accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 7.5 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N). 12/10/2025 12/10/2025 Vector CVSS:3.1 CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) 7.50 Gravedad 3.1 Txt Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) HIGH

HCL Unica Centralized Offer Management is vulnerable to poor unhandled exceptions which exposes sensitive information. An attacker can exploit use this information to exploit known vulnerabilities launch targeted attacks, such as remote code execution or denial of service. 12/10/2025 12/10/2025 Vector CVSS:3.1 CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:R/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) 3.50 Gravedad 3.1 Txt Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) LOW

HCL Unica Centralized Offer Management is vulnerable to Insecure Direct Object References (IDOR). An attacker can bypass authorization and access resources in the system directly, for example database records or files. 12/10/2025 12/10/2025 Vector CVSS:3.1 CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:H/UI:R/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) 4.20 Gravedad 3.1 Txt Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) MEDIUM

HCL Unica Centralized Offer Management is vulnerable to a potential Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF). An attacker can exploit improper input validation by submitting maliciously crafted input to a target application running on a server. 12/10/2025 12/10/2025 Vector CVSS:3.1 CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:R/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:L Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) 3.50 Gravedad 3.1 Txt Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) LOW

A security flaw has been discovered in SourceCodester Best Salon Management System 1.0. This affects an unknown part of the file /panel/add_invoice.php. Performing manipulation of the argument ServiceId results in sql injection. Remote exploitation of the attack is possible. The exploit has been released to the public and may be exploited. 12/10/2025 12/10/2025 Vector CVSS:4.0 CVSS:4.0/AV:N/AC:L/AT:N/PR:N/UI:N/VC:L/VI:L/VA:L/SC:N/SI:N/SA:N/E:P/CR:X/IR:X/AR:X/MAV:X/MAC:X/MAT:X/MPR:X/MUI:X/MVC:X/MVI:X/MVA:X/MSC:X/MSI:X/MSA:X/S:X/AU:X/R:X/V:X/RE:X/U:X Vector CVSS:3.1 CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:L/A:L Vector CVSS:2.0 AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P Gravedad 4.0 6.90 Gravedad 4.0 txt MEDIUM Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) 7.30 Gravedad 3.1 Txt Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) HIGH
